542 35 | area_code = | code = <!-- *** Free frields *** --> | free = <!-- *** Maps *** --> | map = Czechia - outline map.svg | map_background = Czechia - background map.png | map_caption = Location in the Czech Republic | map_locator = Czechia <!-- *** Websites *** --> | commons = Velké Svatoňovice | statistics = | website = [http://www.velkesvatonovice.cz/ www.velkesvatonovice.unas.cz] <!-- *** Footnotes *** --> | footnotes = }} '''Velké Svatoňovice''' is a small village in the [[Czech Republic]], near the [[Karkonosze]], established in 1260 C.E. Velké Svatoňovice has approximately 1100 citizens. Hamlet Markoušovice is administrative part of Velké Svatoňovice. ==External links== * [http://www.velkesvatonovice.cz Village website] (cz) {{DEFAULTSORT:Velke Svatonovice}} [[Category:Villages in the Czech Republic]] [[Category:Trutnov District]] {{HradecKrálové-geo-stub}} {{Trutnov District}}
